name: Dungeon & Trader
description:
You explore; you trade; then you explore some more! Find all the artifacts to get out of the dungeon!

By Team That Thing:

-Edo (music & sound effects)

-Eylon (level design & programming)

-Idan (level design, programming & art)

-Yonatan (level design & art)

Made for the Krass N.G. 3 Game Jam

Patch Notes:

1.1.0.0

-New 'pillar' asset

-New and imporved signs

-Fixed map hole

-Fixed torch bug

-Fixed signs' text getting cut

-Fixed mouse is not showing at the ending screen

-Players are no longer able to drop items outside the store

-Added a not-so-secret messege

1.1.1.0

-Moved an important misplaced sign
